Awards and Honors
1987 British Computer Society Technical Award
1988 Distinguished Fellow of the British Computer Society
1988 Founding Member Academia Europaea
1988 Fellow of the Royal Society
1991 Turing Award
1993 Fellow of the Royal Society of Edinburgh
1994 Fellow of the ACM
2004 Royal Medalist of the Royal Society of Edinburgh
2008 Foreign Associate of the National Academy of Engineering
Turing Award of 1991
